info.title: Lumo - CConnect
info.description: Lumo CConnect REST API: Auth, Users, Posts

get.description: Returns public profile payload including counts and pinnedPostIds.
Returns non-archived announcements for any authenticated user.

post.description: roleKey takes precedence over accountType (must match if both provided). Students (roleKey=3) require degreeId, yearOfJoining (aka academicYear), and studentId; Staff (roleKey=2) may omit degreeId. departmentId is required for all. gender is optional. fullName also accepts legacy alias name. Note: the field is roleKey, not roleId. Usernames must be 3-30 characters long and may contain letters, numbers, dot, underscore, or hyphen (no spaces).

value.message: Username must be 3-30 characters and can include letters, numbers, dot, underscore, or hyphen.

example.error: OTP recently sent. Try again in 120s

value.error: No active OTP. Request a new one.

get.description: Provide roleKey=3 (Student) to receive degrees + departments; roleKey=2 (Staff) to receive designations + departments.

post.description: Verifies the current password, records reason/IP/UA metadata, and issues a deletion requestId plus 4-digit OTP that expires after DELETE_OTP_TTL_MIN minutes.

production.description: Response in production where OTP is emailed only.

nonProduction.description: Response when INCLUDE_OTP_IN_RESPONSE=true or NODE_ENV != production.

400.description: Validation failed or no eligible pending request

post.description: Consumes the requestId + OTP, archives the user snapshot, scrubs personal data, bumps jwtVersion, and attempts to send a confirmation email (best-effort).

400.description: Invalid requestId/otp or no pending request

410.description: Request expired or account already deleted

post.description: Validates the incoming filename, MIME type, and optional file size before issuing a Cloudflare R2 presigned PUT URL. Attach the returned `objectKey` to post metadata so the backend can manage media lifecycle.
Create an admin (roleKey=1). Only super-admins (roleKey=0) may call this endpoint.

get.description: Return active departments marked isVisible=false (internal use). Only super-admins may call this endpoint.

post.description: Create a new announcement post. Admin or super-admin only.

get.description: Paginated list of announcements with optional archived records.

patch.description: Modify announcement content, type, or scheduling. Admin or super-admin only.

post.description: Marks a post as archived so it no longer appears in feeds. Only the owner or admins may call this endpoint.
Clears the archive flag so the post returns to feeds.

delete.description: Removes the post and its related entities permanently.

AuthRegisterRequest.description: Payload for /auth/register. Usernames are trimmed and validated before duplicate checks.

username.description: Case-sensitive handle. Trimmed before persistence. Allowed characters: letters, numbers, dot, underscore, hyphen.

roleKey.description: 2 = Staff, 3 = Student. Must align with accountType if present.

description.example: Email to receive the OTP. Normalized to lowercase.
Status message suitable for UI display.
4-digit OTP echoed in non-production environments or when explicitly enabled.
Role-specific lookup data surfaced after OTP verification.

content.description: Trimmed text, max 2000 characters. Duplicate consecutive posts rejected.

attachments.description: Attach up to 5 images. If a GIF or video is included, it must be the only attachment. Include the `metadata.r2Key` issued by `/media/presign` so the backend can clean up objects.

metadata.description: Additional media information sent back by the storage presign endpoint.

r2Key.description: Required: Cloudflare R2 object key for this file.

duration.description: Duration in seconds for video/GIF uploads.

quotedPostId.description: ID of an existing post to share. When provided, the request is treated as a quote/repost; omit `content` and attachments for silent shares or include them for quote posts.

parentPostId.description: ID of the post this entry replies to when building threaded conversations. Not used for lightweight comments.

urls.description: Normalized https URLs detected in content

likeCount.description: Running total of likes (materialized from post_stats).

viewerHasLiked.description: Whether the requesting user currently likes the post.

description.example: Updated total number of comments on the post.

content.example: Team Phoenix has 3 open slots  DM me if you want in!

description.example: Current password for the logged-in account.
Optional context shared with admins when reviewing deletions.

reason.example: Graduated; no longer need campus access

description.example: Opaque deletion request identifier returned by /users/me/delete-request.
ISO timestamp when the OTP/request expires.
4-digit OTP. Present only when INCLUDE_OTP_IN_RESPONSE=true or NODE_ENV !== "production".
Timestamp when the account was scrubbed and archived.
true when the confirmation email failed to send; account deletion already committed.

AuthLoginRequest.description: Credentials for /auth/login. emailOrUsername is trimmed before lookup.

AuthLoginResponse.description: JWT plus lightweight user profile returned after successful login.

duration.description: Duration in seconds for video or GIF attachments.

order.description: Insertion order maintained by the server.

filename.description: Original file name supplied by the client.

contentType.description: MIME type detected prior to upload (image/* or video/*).

size.description: Optional file size in bytes for pre-flight validation.
